name: Aiden Smith
bio: Aiden Smith is a dynamic right back known for his fierce tackling and relentless work ethic on the pitch. Hailing from the picturesque landscapes of British Columbia, he embodies both rural resilience and urban sophistication. His ability to read the game allows him to initiate counter-attacks quickly, making him a valuable asset to Fraser Valley United. Aiden's left foot delivers precise crosses, often setting up scoring opportunities for his teammates, solidifying his role as a cornerstone of the team's defense.
